personalInfo.name: Vignesh Ram. S
personalInfo.title: Senior Associate | Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.overview: With over 9 years of diverse experience as a full-stack developer, I've transitioned between roles in Frontend, Backend, and Operations at distinct stages of my career.

experiences.description: Leading the FSE team in development of UI modules in the Business Lending platform (React-Spring Boot). Successfully developed highly time-bound modules tailored for Paycheck Protection Program and Loan Forgiveness during COVID crisis (AngularJS). Contributed significantly to greenfield development of REST microservice APIs targeting Billpay and DIY platforms.
highlights: Leading the FSE team in development of UI modules in the Business Lending platform (React-Spring Boot)
Successfully developed highly time-bound modules tailored for Paycheck Protection Program and Loan Forgiveness during COVID crisis (AngularJS)
Contributed significantly to greenfield development of REST microservice APIs targeting Billpay and DIY platforms

experiences.client: TMX, KCC, Strate, CBK, EFI, Deceval, PDTC, CSCS, MCl, KELER, CBB, ACS
experiences.description: Underwent intensive training in Java. Developed web-based app (MI-Frontier) for Depository participants and Issuer Agents (GWT, Bootstrap). Developed scheduler tool for running on-demand and time-based system tasks. Part of Technological Core Group responsible for automation of build and release process.
highlights: Developed web-based app (MI-Frontier) for Depository participants and Issuer Agents (GWT, Bootstrap)
Developed scheduler tool for running on-demand and time-based system tasks
Part of Technological Core Group responsible for automation of build and release process

experiences.description: Completed Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology with outstanding academic performance. University rank holder and consistently ranked among top three in the department throughout the curriculum.
highlights: University rank holder for B.Tech Information Technology (Anna University)
Ranked among the top three in the department of Information Technology throughout the curriculum
Strong foundation in programming, web development, and database management

experiences.description: Completed Higher Secondary education with outstanding academic performance, achieving 93.42% marks with a strong foundation in science and mathematics.
highlights: Strong performance in Mathematics and Science subjects
Excellent academic record throughout secondary education

experiences.description: Completed secondary education with exceptional academic performance, achieving 94.4% marks and establishing a strong academic foundation.
highlights: Consistently high performance across all subjects
Strong foundation in core academic subjects
Excellent discipline and study habits developed

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my development work and creative solutions

list.name: A Personalised Online Board Game
list.description: Developed a custom digital board game featuring my wife's life journey from childhood to present, complete with personal photos and memorable events. Created as a heartfelt birthday gift combining gaming mechanics with cherished memories.

list.name: Enterprise Task Management System
list.description: Built a comprehensive task management platform for enterprise teams with real-time collaboration, advanced analytics, and automated workflow management. Features include drag-and-drop task boards, time tracking, and team performance insights.

list.name: Real-Time Weather Analytics Dashboard
list.description: Developed a sophisticated weather analytics platform that aggregates data from multiple APIs to provide detailed forecasts, historical trends, and climate insights. Features interactive maps, customizable alerts, and data visualization.

list.name: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
list.description: Created an intelligent code review tool that uses machine learning to analyze code quality, detect potential bugs, and suggest improvements. Integrates with popular IDEs and supports multiple programming languages with automated report generation.
